item.description:
It's back! Yes, that's right – we're bringing back brunch at Alchemy on some special select Sundays, and you're invited to experience the most luscious, nutrient-dense, and amazingly delicious brunch around – featuring local products such as eggs, veggies and maple syrup! There will be a wide selection of raw brunch items, as well as your favorite comfort foods! Enjoy live music and entertainment, and the Alchemy crew proudly serving you the most amazing organic brunch made with LOVE! If you've been missing our brunch, now's your chance! Tell all your family and friends – not to be missed!

Come for brunch anytime from 10-4! Alchemy Juice Bar Cafe, 203 New Britain Avenue, Hartford.

Some items from the brunch menu...
Live Quiche ~ Local Eggs with sprouted toast & rosemary potatoes ~ Love Alive's Raw Superfood Granola with almond mylk & fresh fruit ~ Vegan Pancakes with coconut "butter," local maple syrup & fresh fruit ~ Live Chia Porridge with fresh fruit & a dollop of macadamia creme ~ Manna Bread French Toast with coconut "butter," local maple syrup & fresh fruit ~ Avocado Sandwich ~ Succulent Sunday Salad ~ Live Parfait ~ freshly baked muffins & cakes ~ Live Pie of the day ~ Live Cheezecake of the day ~ Fresh OJ & Grapefruit Juice ~ Shilajit & Medicinal Teas ~ Sprout Mama's wheatgrass & fermented veggies ~ Chocolates and more...
item.name: Live ~ Local ~ Organic ~ Brunch at Alchemy!
